home.heroDescription: Premium interior design solutions for discerning clients who demand excellence.
home.introText1: TRQ STUDIO is an interior design studio that crafts luxurious spaces embodying elegance through a holistic approach that harmoniously balances aesthetics, functionality, and sensory experience.
home.introText2: The studio delivers fully integrated design solutions that respect context and identity, executed to the highest standards across high-end residential, commercial, and distinguished institutional projects.
home.servicesDescription: Comprehensive design solutions tailored to your unique vision and requirements
home.featuredDescription: A glimpse into our recent work and design excellence
home.howWeWorkDescription: A seamless process designed to bring your vision to life
home.ctaDescription: Let's discuss your project and create something extraordinary together. Get in touch with our team today.

about.heroDescription: Crafting exceptional spaces through vision, expertise, and dedication
about.whoWeAreText1: TRQ is a luxury and creative interior design studio based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Founded on the principles of excellence, innovation, and client-centric service, we have established ourselves as a premier design partner for discerning clients who demand the best.
about.whoWeAreText2: Our multidisciplinary team brings together expertise in interior design, architecture, furniture design, and project management to deliver comprehensive solutions that exceed expectations.
about.whoWeAreText3: Whether creating intimate residential spaces or grand commercial environments, we approach each project with the same level of dedication, creativity, and attention to detail that has become our hallmark.
about.visionText: To be recognized as the leading luxury design studio in Saudi Arabia and beyond, setting new standards for creative excellence and transforming spaces into timeless works of art that inspire and elevate the human experience.
about.missionText: To deliver exceptional, bespoke design solutions that reflect our clients' unique vision while exceeding their expectations. We are committed to combining artistic innovation with practical expertise, creating spaces that are both beautiful and functional.
about.valuesDescription: The principles that guide our work and define our approach to design
about.value1Desc: We pursue the highest standards in every project, ensuring exceptional quality and attention to detail.
about.value2Desc: We embrace creativity and push boundaries to deliver unique, forward-thinking design solutions.
about.value3Desc: We work closely with our clients, valuing their input and building lasting partnerships.
about.value4Desc: Our love for design drives us to create spaces that inspire and delight.
about.whyChooseDescription: What sets us apart in the world of luxury interior design
about.why1Desc: Specializing in high-end residential and commercial projects that demand the finest craftsmanship.
about.why2Desc: From concept to completion, we manage every aspect of your project with meticulous care.
about.why3Desc: Deep understanding of Saudi Arabian culture combined with global design perspectives.
about.why4Desc: Successfully delivered premium projects across residential, commercial, and exhibition sectors.
about.impactText1: We don't just design spaces—we transform the way our clients live, work, and experience their environments. Through thoughtful design, meticulous execution, and unwavering commitment to quality, we create spaces that inspire, comfort, and elevate daily life.
about.impactText2: Every project is an opportunity to make a lasting positive impact, and we take this responsibility seriously. Our success is measured not just in completed projects, but in the satisfaction and delight of our clients.

services.heroDescription: Comprehensive design solutions tailored to your unique vision
services.introDescription: From intimate residential spaces to grand commercial projects, from exhibition booths to custom furniture, TRQ offers a comprehensive suite of design services.
services.highlightsDescription: What you can expect when working with TRQ
services.highlight1Desc: Every project is unique. We create bespoke designs that reflect your specific needs, preferences, and vision.
services.highlight2Desc: From initial consultation to final installation, we manage every detail to ensure a seamless experience.
services.highlight3Desc: We source the finest materials and work with skilled craftsmen to deliver exceptional results.
services.ctaDescription: Let's discuss your project and explore how our services can bring your vision to life.

workflow.heroDescription: A seamless process designed to bring your vision to life
workflow.introDescription: At TRQ, we believe that exceptional design requires a structured yet flexible approach. Our five-step workflow ensures that every project receives the attention, expertise, and care it deserves, from initial concept to final completion.
workflow.step2Desc: Bringing your vision to life through creative design
workflow.whyDescription: Built on years of experience and refined through countless successful projects
workflow.why1Desc: We work closely with you at every stage, ensuring your vision guides the entire process and the final result exceeds your expectations.
workflow.why2Desc: Clear communication, regular updates, and complete transparency in timelines, budgets, and decision-making throughout the project.
workflow.why3Desc: Streamlined workflows, experienced project management, and attention to detail ensure projects are completed on time and to the highest standards.
workflow.timelineText1: While every project is unique, most projects follow a similar timeline. Residential projects typically take 3-6 months from concept to completion, while larger commercial projects may require 6-12 months or more.
workflow.timelineText2: During our initial consultation, we'll provide you with a detailed timeline specific to your project's scope and requirements.
workflow.ctaDescription: Let's start with a consultation to discuss your project and explore how we can bring your vision to life.

portfolio.heroDescription: Explore our collection of exceptional design projects
portfolio.introDescription: Each project represents our commitment to excellence, creativity, and attention to detail. From intimate residential spaces to grand commercial environments, our portfolio showcases the breadth and depth of our design expertise.
portfolio.noProjects: No projects found in this category.
portfolio.ctaDescription: Ready to start your own design journey? Get in touch with our team to discuss your vision and explore how we can bring it to life.

blog.heroDescription: Expert perspectives on luxury interior design, trends, and inspiration
blog.noArticles: No articles found in this category.
blog.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to receive our latest articles, design insights, and project updates directly to your inbox.
blog.privacyNote: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
blog.checkBackSoon: Check back soon for design insights and inspiration.

contact.heroDescription: Let's discuss your project and create something extraordinary together
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.subject: SUBJECT
contact.messageReceived: Your message has been received. We'll be in touch soon.
contact.visitStudioDescription: Schedule an appointment to visit our design studio, view our portfolio, and discuss your project in person.
contact.openInMaps: Click to Open in Google Maps

pricing.heroDescription: Get a custom quote tailored to your project
pricing.formIntroDescription: Please provide as much detail as possible about your project. The more we know, the more accurate and tailored our proposal will be.
pricing.emailMethodDesc: We'll send you a detailed proposal
pricing.successDescription: Thank you for your interest in TRQ Design Studio. We have received your pricing request and will review it carefully.
pricing.step1Desc: Our team will review your project details within 24 hours.
pricing.step2Desc: We'll reach out to discuss your project in more detail.
pricing.step3Desc: We'll prepare a detailed proposal with pricing tailored to your needs.
pricing.expectDescription: Our pricing process is transparent and tailored to your specific needs
pricing.expect1Desc: We carefully review your requirements and project scope to understand your vision.
pricing.expect2Desc: We prepare a comprehensive proposal with itemized pricing and project timeline.
pricing.expect3Desc: We schedule a meeting to discuss the proposal and answer any questions you have.
